channel.title: NPC Rotation [718]
channel.description: Hey guys, me again once again asking another question (sorry for so many of them); I was wondering how I rotate my NPC. I Don't really see an option or a tutorial how to rotate them. It cant be impossible because iv played a few server with the NPC facing different directions. Can anyone help? Thanks!
